system:
note description: "Used for defining a clip region in EV_DRAWABLE" author: "" date: "$Date: 2013-05-20 16:15:17 -0700 (Mon, 20 May 2013) $" revision: "$Revision: 92557 $"
class ../interface/ev_region.xmlEV_REGION
inherit ../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY redefine ../interface/ev_region.xml#f_implementationimplementation, ../interface/ev_region.xml#f_copycopy, ../interface/ev_region.xml#f_is_equalis_equal end
create ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_default_createdefault_create, ../interface/ev_region.xml#f_make_with_rectanglemake_with_rectangle
convert ../interface/ev_region.xml#f_make_with_rectanglemake_with_rectangle ({../interface/ev_rectangle.xmlEV_RECTANGLE})
feature {NONE} -- Initialize
f_make_with_rectangle../interface/ev_region.xml#f_make_with_rectanglemake_with_rectangle (a_rectangle: ../interface/ev_rectangle.xmlEV_RECTANGLE) -- Create region with area set to a_rectangle. require a_rect_not_void: a_rectangle /= Void do ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_default_createdefault_create ../interface/ev_region.xml#f_set_rectangleset_rectangle (a_rectangle) end
feature -- Element Change
f_set_rectangle../interface/ev_region.xml#f_set_rectangleset_rectangle (a_rectangle: ../interface/ev_rectangle.xmlEV_RECTANGLE) -- Set region to area a_rectangle. require a_rect_not_void: a_rectangle /= Void not_is_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do ../interface/ev_region.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_region_i.xml#f_set_rectangleset_rectangle (a_rectangle) end
f_offset../interface/ev_region.xml#f_offsetoffset (a_horizontal_offset, a_vertical_offset: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Move Current a a_horizontal_offset horizontally and a_vertical_offset vertically. require not_is_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do ../interface/ev_region.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_region_i.xml#f_offsetoffset (a_horizontal_offset, a_vertical_offset) end
feature -- Access
f_intersect../interface/ev_region.xml#f_intersectintersect alias "../interface/ev_region.xml#f_intersectand" (a_region: ../interface/ev_region.xmlEV_REGION): ../interface/ev_region.xmlEV_REGION -- Intersection of a_region with Current . -- Was declared in ../interface/ev_region.xmlEV_REGION as synonym of ../interface/ev_region.xml#f_conjunctedconjuncted. require a_region_valid: a_region /= Void and then not a_region.../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed not_is_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_region.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_region_i.xml#f_intersectintersect (a_region) ensure result_not_void: Result /= Void end
f_conjuncted../interface/ev_region.xml#f_conjunctedconjuncted alias "../interface/ev_region.xml#f_conjuncted&" (a_region: ../interface/ev_region.xmlEV_REGION): ../interface/ev_region.xmlEV_REGION -- Intersection of a_region with Current . -- Was declared in ../interface/ev_region.xmlEV_REGION as synonym of ../interface/ev_region.xml#f_intersectintersect. require a_region_valid: a_region /= Void and then not a_region.../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed not_is_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_region.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_region_i.xml#f_intersectintersect (a_region) ensure result_not_void: Result /= Void end
f_union../interface/ev_region.xml#f_unionunion alias "../interface/ev_region.xml#f_unionor" (a_region: ../interface/ev_region.xmlEV_REGION): ../interface/ev_region.xmlEV_REGION -- Union of a_region with Current. -- Was declared in ../interface/ev_region.xmlEV_REGION as synonym of ../interface/ev_region.xml#f_disjuncteddisjuncted. require a_region_valid: a_region /= Void and then not a_region.../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed not_is_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_region.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_region_i.xml#f_unionunion (a_region) ensure result_not_void: Result /= Void end
f_disjuncted../interface/ev_region.xml#f_disjuncteddisjuncted alias "../interface/ev_region.xml#f_disjuncted|" (a_region: ../interface/ev_region.xmlEV_REGION): ../interface/ev_region.xmlEV_REGION -- Union of a_region with Current. -- Was declared in ../interface/ev_region.xmlEV_REGION as synonym of ../interface/ev_region.xml#f_unionunion. require a_region_valid: a_region /= Void and then not a_region.../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed not_is_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_region.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_region_i.xml#f_unionunion (a_region) ensure result_not_void: Result /= Void end
f_subtract../interface/ev_region.xml#f_subtractsubtract alias "../interface/ev_region.xml#f_subtract-" (a_region: ../interface/ev_region.xmlEV_REGION): ../interface/ev_region.xmlEV_REGION -- a_region subtracted from Current. require a_region_valid: a_region /= Void and then not a_region.../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed not_is_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_region.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_region_i.xml#f_subtractsubtract (a_region) ensure result_not_void: Result /= Void end
f_exclusive_or../interface/ev_region.xml#f_exclusive_orexclusive_or alias "../interface/ev_region.xml#f_exclusive_orxor" (a_region: ../interface/ev_region.xmlEV_REGION): ../interface/ev_region.xmlEV_REGION -- Exclusive or a_region with Current. require a_region_valid: a_region /= Void and then not a_region.../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed not_is_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_region.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_region_i.xml#f_exclusive_orexclusive_or (a_region) ensure result_not_void: Result /= Void end
feature -- Duplication
f_copy../interface/ev_region.xml#f_copycopy (other: like Current) -- Update Current to have same appearance as other. -- (So as to satisfy ../interface/ev_region.xml#f_is_equalis_equal.) do if ../interface/ev_region.xml#f_implementationimplementation = Void then ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_default_createdefault_create end if not other.../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed then ../interface/ev_region.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_region_i.xml#f_copy_regioncopy_region (other) else ../interface/ev_region.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_destroydestroy end end
feature -- Comparison
f_is_equal../interface/ev_region.xml#f_is_equalis_equal (other: like Current): FalseBOOLEAN -- Does other have the same appearance as Current. do if other /= Void then if other.../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed and then ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed then Result := True else Result := ../interface/ev_region.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_region_i.xml#f_is_region_equalis_region_equal (other) end end end
feature {NONE} -- Implementation
f_create_interface_objects../interface/ev_region.xml#f_create_interface_objectscreate_interface_objects -- Create objects to be used by Current in ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_initializeinitialize -- Implemented by descendants to create attached objects -- in order to adhere to void-safety due to the implementation bridge pattern. do end
f_create_implementation../interface/ev_region.xml#f_create_implementationcreate_implementation -- Create implementation. do create {../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xmlEV_REGION_IMP} ../interface/ev_region.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xml#f_makemake end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_implementation../interface/ev_region.xml#f_implementationimplementation: ../implementation_interface/ev_region_i.xmlEV_REGION_I -- Implementation interface.

end -- class ../interface/ev_region.xmlEV_REGION
